```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
road_segments <- st_read("../data/Davidson_County data shapefiles/Davidson_Road_Segment_data.shp", as_tibble = T, quiet = T, ) %>%
  st_transform('+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84') %>%
  filter(!st_is_empty(.)) %>%
  transmute(RD_MSLINK = MSLINK, 
            ID_NUMBER, 
            RD_BLM = BLM,
            RD_ELM = ELM,
            RTE_NME, 
            FUNC_CLASS) %>%
  group_by(ID_NUMBER) %>%
  mutate(RD_SEGMENTS = n(), .after = ID_NUMBER) %>%
  ungroup()

roadway_geometrics <- st_read("../data/Davidson_County data shapefiles/Davidson_Roadway_Geometrics_data.shp", as_tibble = T, quiet = T) %>%
  st_transform('+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84') %>%
  transmute(GEO_MSLINK = MSLINK, 
            ID_NUMBER,
            GEO_BLM = BLM, 
            GEO_ELM = ELM,
            NBR_LANES, 
            THRU_LANES, 
            SPD_LMT, 
            ILLUM, 
            TY_TERRAIN, 
            LAND_USE) %>%
  group_by(ID_NUMBER) %>%
  mutate(GEO_SEGMENTS = n(), .after = ID_NUMBER) %>%
  ungroup()

traffic_segments <- st_read("../data/Davidson_County data shapefiles/Davidson_Traffic_Segment_data.shp", as_tibble = T, quiet = T) %>%
  st_transform('+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84') %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  transmute(TR_MSLINK = MSLINK,
            ID_NUMBER,
            TR_BLM = BLM,
            TR_ELM = ELM,
            AADT,
            DHV_PCT,
            PCT_PEAK_H,
            DRCT_DISTR)
```


```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
roads_1 <- roadway_geometrics %>%
  inner_join(road_segments %>% st_drop_geometry()) %>% 
  filter(GEO_SEGMENTS >= RD_SEGMENTS) %>%
  group_by(GEO_MSLINK) %>%
  slice_min(abs((GEO_BLM + GEO_ELM) / 2 - (RD_BLM + RD_ELM) / 2)) %>%
  mutate(BLM = GEO_BLM, ELM = GEO_ELM)

roads_2 <- road_segments %>%
  inner_join(roadway_geometrics %>% st_drop_geometry()) %>%
  filter(RD_SEGMENTS > GEO_SEGMENTS) %>%
  group_by(RD_MSLINK) %>%
  slice_min(abs((RD_BLM + RD_ELM) / 2 - (GEO_BLM + GEO_ELM) / 2)) %>%
  mutate(BLM = RD_BLM, ELM = RD_ELM)

roads <- bind_rows(roads_1, roads_2) %>%
  select(ID_NUMBER,
         BLM,
         ELM,
         RTE_NME,
         FUNC_CLASS,
         NBR_LANES,
         THRU_LANES,
         SPD_LMT,
         ILLUM,
         TY_TERRAIN,
         LAND_USE) %>%
  arrange(ID_NUMBER, BLM, ELM)

roads_final <- roads %>%
  st_drop_geometry() %>%
  inner_join(traffic_segments %>% st_drop_geometry()) %>%
  group_by(ID_NUMBER, BLM, ELM) %>%
  slice_min(abs((BLM + ELM) / 2 - (TR_BLM + TR_ELM) / 2)) %>%
  right_join(roads) %>%
  select(ID_NUMBER,
         BLM,
         ELM,
         RTE_NME,
         FUNC_CLASS,
         NBR_LANES,
         THRU_LANES,
         SPD_LMT,
         ILLUM,
         TY_TERRAIN,
         LAND_USE,
         AADT,
         DHV_PCT,
         PCT_PEAK_H,
         DRCT_DISTR,
         geometry) %>%
  st_sf(sf_column_name = 'geometry')
```

```{r}
accidents_1 <- st_read("../data/traffic_accidents_2021_11_23/geo_export_843312ea-42b0-4c02-a5a6-277108a3e379.shp", as_tibble = T, quiet = T) %>%
  st_transform('+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84') %>%
  filter(!st_is_empty(.)) %>%
  filter(!geometry %in% st_sfc(st_point(c(0, 0))))

accidents_2 <- st_read("../data/traffic_accidents_2022_01_11/geo_export_80ccc574-077c-4ad8-b6d5-668c371ae1f9.shp", as_tibble = T, quiet = T) %>%
  st_transform('+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84') %>%
  filter(!st_is_empty(.)) %>%
  filter(!geometry %in% st_sfc(st_point(c(0, 0))))

accidents <- bind_rows(accidents_1, accidents_2) %>% 
  distinct(accident_n, .keep_all = T)

colnames(accidents) <-
  c("accident_n", "date", "time", "motor_vehicles_n", "injuries_n", "fatalities_n",
    "property_damage", "hit_and_run", "reporting_officer", "collision_type_code",
    "collision_type_desc", "weather_code", "weather_desc", "illumination_code",
    "illumination_desc", "harmful_code", "harmful_desc", "street_address", "city",
    "state", "zip", "rpa", "precinct", "lat", "long", "geometry")

accidents <- accidents %>%
  mutate(year = year(date), 
         month = month(date), 
         day = day(date), 
         .after = date) %>%
  filter(year < 2022) %>%
  mutate(injury = injuries_n > 0, 
         multi_injury = injuries_n > 1, 
         .after = injuries_n) %>%
  mutate(hit_and_run = as.logical(hit_and_run))
```

```{r}
nearest <- st_nearest_feature(accidents, roads_final)
accidents_to_roads <- bind_cols(accidents %>% st_drop_geometry(), roads_final[nearest, ])
```

```{r}
accidents_by_road <- accidents_to_roads %>% 
  group_by(ID_NUMBER, BLM, ELM) %>%
  summarize(accidents = n(), 
            injury = sum(injury), 
            multi_injury = sum(multi_injury),
            hit_and_run = sum(hit_and_run)) %>%
  mutate(injury_pct = ifelse(accidents >= 15, injury / accidents, NA)) %>%
  mutate(multi_injury_pct = ifelse(accidents >= 15, multi_injury / accidents, NA)) %>%
  mutate(hit_and_run_pct = ifelse(accidents >= 15, hit_and_run / accidents, NA)) %>%
  right_join(roads_final) %>%
  mutate(across(c(accidents, injury, multi_injury, hit_and_run), ~replace_na(.x, 0))) %>%
  st_sf(sf_column_name = 'geometry')
```

```{r}
accidents_filtered <- accidents %>%
  sample_n(1000)

accidents_filtered$label <- 
  paste0("<b>Date:</b> ", accidents_filtered$date, "<br>",
         "<b>Time:</b> ", accidents_filtered$time, "<br>", 
         "<b>Street Address:</b> ", accidents_filtered$street_address, "<br>",
         "<b>Harmful Description:</b> ", accidents_filtered$harmful_desc, "<br>",
         "<b>Collision Type Description:</b> ", accidents_filtered$collision_type_desc, "<br>",
         "<b>Number of Vehicles:</b> ", accidents_filtered$motor_vehicles_n, "<br>",
         "<b>Number of Injuries:</b> ", accidents_filtered$injuries_n) %>%
  lapply(htmltools::HTML)

interstates <- accidents_by_road %>% 
  filter(FUNC_CLASS %in% c("R / INTERSTATE", 
                           "U / INTERSTATE", 
                           "U / FWY OR EXP"))

arterial_roads <- accidents_by_road %>% 
  filter(FUNC_CLASS %in% c("R / MIN ART", 
                           "U / MIN ART", 
                           "R / OTH PRIN ART", 
                           "U / MIN ART", 
                           "U OTH PRIN  ART"))

collector_roads <- accidents_by_road %>% 
  filter(FUNC_CLASS %in% c("R / MAJ COL", 
                           "R / MIN COL", 
                           "U / MAJ COL"))

local_roads <- accidents_by_road %>% 
  filter(FUNC_CLASS %in% c("R / LOCAL", 
                           "U / LOCAL"))
```

```{r}
accidents_to_roads %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  count(month) %>% 
  group_by(month) %>%
  summarize_at(vars(n), list(mean = mean, sd = sd)) %>%
  mutate(month = as.factor(month)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = month, y = mean)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = mean - sd, ymax = mean + sd), width = 0.2)
```
